name: Trypophobia!
description:
Originally titled "Face Your Fears!", this is a game about fighting different unrealistic manifestations of your fears while you sleep.

Getting hit makes your fear go up, and if you get too scared you die.

You can use WASD/Arrow keys to move around, and the mouse controls where you are looking. Click or press space to attack enemies. BE BRAVE!

(p.s. it's like 10 seconds worth of gameplay)
